title: Page 122 - Medical Articles and News for Health | Top Doctors
description: In Top Doctors we offer the latest news on health, medicine and news by the best experts. Discover our medical items!
cleaned_text: By [Dr John Chinegwundoh](/doctor/john-chinegwundoh) 26.07.22 [ Breathlessness: when should I see a doctor? ](/medical-articles/breathlessness-when-should-i-see-a-doctor) While occasionally feeling short of breath is a healthy and normal human response, having difficulty breathing (also known as breathlessness) may be a sign of a serious condition. Dr John Chinegwundoh, a highly-experienced Consultant Respiratory Physician, provides an expert insight into breathlessness, including when medical attention should be sought.
